alert.note: Alert for Coastal Aransas; Coastal Refugio; Inland Calhoun; Inland Refugio; Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 5:23PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Aransas, northwestern Calhoun, south central Victoria and northeastern Refugio Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 521 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of Quintana, or 8 miles southwest of McFaddin, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... McFaddin, Quintana, Green Lake, Tivoli, Aransas National Wildlife Refuge, Long Mott and Austwell. This includes US Highway 77 between mile markers 598 and 616. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Aransas; Coastal Refugio; Inland Calhoun; Inland Refugio; Victoria
